00047 #include <stdio.h>
00048 #include "midas.h"
00049 #include "mcstd.h"
00050 
00051 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052 
00053 /*
00054   Base address of PC card. Must match jumper setting:
00055   ===================================================
00056 
00057   ADDRESS SA9-SA4
00058   c=close=on=0
00059   o=open=off=1
00060 
00061   0x380 -> oo occc (11 1000)
00062   0x2f0 -> oc oooo (10 1111)
00063   0x280 -> oc occc (10 1000)
00064 */
00065 
00066 #define CAMAC_BASE 0x280
00067 
00068 #define CSR1 CAMAC_BASE+0
00069 #define CSR2 CAMAC_BASE+0x1
00070 #define MCR  CAMAC_BASE+0x2
00071 #define C    CAMAC_BASE+0x3
00072 #define NAF1 CAMAC_BASE+0x4
00073 #define NAF2 CAMAC_BASE+0x5
00074 #define DL   CAMAC_BASE+0x6
00075 #define DM   CAMAC_BASE+0x7
00076 #define DH   CAMAC_BASE+0x8
00077 #define PP   CAMAC_BASE+0x9
00078 
00079 /*
00080   Interrupt request selection. Must match jumper setting:
00081   =======================================================
00082 
00083 Switch IRQ2-7
00084 */
00085 
00086 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00087 
00088 #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
00089 #include <dos.h>
00090 #define OUTP(_p, _d) outportb(_p, _d)
00091 #define OUTPW(_p, _d) outport(_p, _d)
00092 #define INP(_p) inportb(_p)
00093 #define INPW(_p) inport(_p)
00094 #elif defined( _MSC_VER )
00095 #include <windows.h>
00096 #include <conio.h>
00097 #define OUTP(_p, _d) _outp((unsigned short) (_p), (int) (_d))
00098 #define OUTPW(_p, _d) _outpw((unsigned short) (_p), (unsigned short) (_d))
00099 #define INP(_p) _inp((unsigned short) (_p))
00100 #define INPW(_p) _inpw((unsigned short) (_p))
00101 #elif defined(OS_LINUX)
00102 #include <asm/io.h>
00103 #include <unistd.h>
00104 #define OUTP(_p, _d) outb(_d, _p)
00105 #define OUTPW(_p, _d) outw(_d, _p)
00106 #define INP(_p) inb(_p)
00107 #define INPW(_p) inw(_p)
00108 #endif
00109 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00110 INLINE void cam8i(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, unsigned char *d)
00111 {
00112 }
00113 
00114 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00115 INLINE void cami(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, WORD * d)
00116 {
00117    OUTP(C, c);
00118    OUTP(NAF1, (a << 5) | f);
00119    OUTP(NAF2, (n << 1) | (a >> 3));
00120    OUTP(CSR1, 1);
00121    while (!(INP(CSR1) & 128));
00122    *((char *) d) = (unsigned char) INP(DL);
00123    *((char *) d + 1) = (unsigned char) INP(DM);
00124 }
00125 
00126 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00127 INLINE void cam16i(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, WORD * d)
00128 {
00129    cami(c, n, a, f, d);
00130 }
00131 
00132 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00133 INLINE void cam24i(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, DWORD * d)
00134 {
00135    OUTP(C, c);
00136    OUTP(NAF1, (a << 5) | f);
00137    OUTP(NAF2, (n << 1) | (a >> 3));
00138    OUTP(CSR1, 1);
00139    while (!(INP(CSR1) & 128));
00140    *((char *) d) = (unsigned char) INP(DL);
00141    *((char *) d + 1) = (unsigned char) INP(DM);
00142    *((char *) d + 2) = (unsigned char) INP(DH);
00143 }
00144 
00145 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00146 INLINE void cam8i_q(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00147                     unsigned char *d, int *x, int *q)
00148 {
00149 }
00150 
00151 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00152 INLINE void cam16i_q(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00153                      WORD * d, int *x, int *q)
00154 {
00155    OUTP(C, c);
00156    OUTP(NAF1, (a << 5) | f);
00157    OUTP(NAF2, (n << 1) | (a >> 3));
00158    OUTP(CSR1, 1);
00159    while (!(INP(CSR1) & 128));
00160    *((char *) d) = (unsigned char) INP(DL);
00161    *((char *) d + 1) = (unsigned char) INP(DM);
00162    *((char *) d + 2) = (unsigned char) INP(DH);
00163    *q = (((INP(CSR1) >> 1) & 1) ^ 1);
00164    *x = (((INP(CSR1) >> 2) & 1) ^ 1);
00165 }
00166 
00167 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00168 INLINE void cam24i_q(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00169                      DWORD * d, int *x, int *q)
00170 {
00171    OUTP(C, c);
00172    OUTP(NAF1, (a << 5) | f);
00173    OUTP(NAF2, (n << 1) | (a >> 3));
00174    OUTP(CSR1, 1);
00175    while (!(INP(CSR1) & 128));
00176    *((char *) d) = (unsigned char) INP(DL);
00177    *((char *) d + 1) = (unsigned char) INP(DM);
00178    *((char *) d + 2) = (unsigned char) INP(DH);
00179    *q = (((INP(CSR1) >> 1) & 1) ^ 1);
00180    *x = (((INP(CSR1) >> 2) & 1) ^ 1);
00181 }
00182 
00183 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00184 INLINE void cam16i_r(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00185                      WORD ** d, const int r)
00186 {
00187    WORD i;
00188 
00189    OUTP(C, c);
00190    OUTP(NAF1, (a << 5) | f);
00191    OUTP(NAF2, (n << 1) | (a >> 3));
00192    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00193       OUTP(CSR1, 1);
00194       while (!(INP(CSR1) & 128));
00195       *((char *) (*d)) = (unsigned char) INP(DL);
00196       *((char *) (*d) + 1) = (unsigned char) INP(DM);
00197       (*d)++;
00198    }
00199 }
00200 
00201 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00202 INLINE void cam24i_r(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00203                      DWORD ** d, const int r)
00204 {
00205    WORD i;
00206 
00207    OUTP(C, c);
00208    OUTP(NAF1, (a << 5) | f);
00209    OUTP(NAF2, (n << 1) | (a >> 3));
00210    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00211       OUTP(CSR1, 1);
00212       while (!(INP(CSR1) & 128));
00213       *((char *) (*d)) = (unsigned char) INP(DL);
00214       *((char *) (*d) + 1) = (unsigned char) INP(DM);
00215       *((char *) (*d) + 2) = (unsigned char) INP(DH);
00216       (*d)++;
00217    }
00218 }
00219 
00220 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00221 INLINE void cam16i_rq(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00222                       WORD ** d, const int r)
00223 {
00224    int i, x, q;
00225 
00226    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00227       cam16i_q(c, n, a, f, (*d)++, &x, &q);
00228       if (!q) {
00229          (*d)--;
00230          break;
00231       }
00232    }
00233 }
00234 
00235 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00236 INLINE void cam24i_rq(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00237                       DWORD ** d, const int r)
00238 {
00239    int i, x, q;
00240 
00241    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00242       cam24i_q(c, n, a, f, (*d)++, &x, &q);
00243       if (!q) {
00244          (*d)--;
00245          break;
00246       }
00247    }
00248 }
00249 
00250 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00251 INLINE void cam16i_sa(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00252                       WORD ** d, const int r)
00253 {
00254    int i, aa;
00255 
00256    aa = a;
00257    OUTP(C, c);
00258    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00259       OUTP(NAF1, (aa << 5) | f);
00260       OUTP(NAF2, (n << 1) | (a >> 3));
00261       OUTP(CSR1, 1);
00262       while (!(INP(CSR1) & 128));
00263       *((char *) (*d)) = (unsigned char) INP(DL);
00264       *((char *) (*d) + 1) = (unsigned char) INP(DM);
00265       aa++;
00266       (*d)++;
00267    }
00268 }
00269 
00270 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00271 INLINE void cam24i_sa(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00272                       DWORD ** d, const int r)
00273 {
00274    int i, aa;
00275 
00276    aa = a;
00277    OUTP(C, c);
00278    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {

00280       OUTP(NAF2, (n << 1) | (a >> 3));

00282       while (!(INP(CSR1) & 128));
00283       *((char *) (*d)) = (unsigned char) INP(DL);
00284       *((char *) (*d) + 1) = (unsigned char) INP(DM);
00285       *((char *) (*d) + 2) = (unsigned char) INP(DH);
00286       aa++;
00287       (*d)++;
00288    }
00289 }

00316 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00317 INLINE void camo(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, WORD d)
00318 {
00319    OUTP(C, c);
00320    OUTP(NAF1, (a << 5) | f);
00321    OUTP(NAF2, (n << 1) | (a >> 3));
00322    OUTP(DL, (unsigned char) d);
00323    OUTP(DM, *(((unsigned char *) &d) + 1));
00324    OUTP(DH, 0);
00325    OUTP(CSR1, 1);
00326 }
00327 
00328 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00329 INLINE void cam16o(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, WORD d)
00330 {
00331    camo(c, n, a, f, d);
00332 }
00333 
00334 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00335 INLINE void cam24o(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, DWORD d)
00336 {
00337    OUTP(C, c);
00338    OUTP(NAF1, (a << 5) | f);
00339    OUTP(NAF2, (n << 1) | (a >> 3));
00340    OUTP(DL, (unsigned char) d);
00341    OUTP(DM, *(((unsigned char *) &d) + 1));
00342    OUTP(DH, *(((unsigned char *) &d) + 2));
00343    OUTP(CSR1, 1);
00344 }
00345 
00346 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00347 INLINE void cam16o_q(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00348                      WORD d, int *x, int *q)
00349 {
00350    OUTP(C, c);
00351    OUTP(NAF1, (a << 5) | f);
00352    OUTP(NAF2, (n << 1) | (a >> 3));
00353    OUTP(DL, (unsigned char) d);
00354    OUTP(DM, *(((unsigned char *) &d) + 1));
00355    OUTP(DH, 0);
00356    OUTP(CSR1, 1);
00357    while (!(INP(CSR1) & 128));
00358    *q = (((INP(CSR1) >> 1) & 1) ^ 1);
00359    *x = (((INP(CSR1) >> 2) & 1) ^ 1);
00360 }
00361 
00362 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00363 INLINE void cam24o_q(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00364                      DWORD d, int *x, int *q)
00365 {
00366    OUTP(C, c);
00367    OUTP(NAF1, (a << 5) | f);
00368    OUTP(NAF2, (n << 1) | (a >> 3));
00369    OUTP(DL, (unsigned char) d);
00370    OUTP(DM, *(((unsigned char *) &d) + 1));
00371    OUTP(DH, *(((unsigned char *) &d) + 2));
00372    OUTP(CSR1, 1);
00373    while (!(INP(CSR1) & 128));
00374    *q = (((INP(CSR1) >> 1) & 1) ^ 1);
00375    *x = (((INP(CSR1) >> 2) & 1) ^ 1);
00376 }

00385 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00386 INLINE void cam16o_r(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00387                      WORD * d, const int r)
00388 {
00389    WORD i;
00390    OUTP(C, c);
00391    OUTP(NAF1, (a << 5) | f);
00392    OUTP(NAF2, (n << 1) | (a >> 3));
00393    OUTP(DH, 0);
00394    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00395       OUTP(DL, *((unsigned char *) d));
00396       OUTP(DM, *(((unsigned char *) d) + 1));
00397       OUTP(CSR1, 1);
00398       d++;
00399    }
00400 }
00401 
00402 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00403 INLINE void cam24o_r(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00404                      DWORD * d, const int r)
00405 {
00406    WORD i;
00407    OUTP(C, c);
00408    OUTP(NAF1, (a << 5) | f);
00409    OUTP(NAF2, (n << 1) | (a >> 3));
00410    OUTP(DH, 0);
00411    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00412       OUTP(DL, *((unsigned char *) d));
00413       OUTP(DM, *(((unsigned char *) d) + 1));
00414       OUTP(DH, *(((unsigned char *) d) + 2));
00415       OUTP(CSR1, 1);
00416       d++;
00417    }
00418 }

00420 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00421 INLINE int camc_chk(const int c)
00422 {
00423    unsigned int n, a, f;
00424 
00425    /* clear inhibit */
00426    camc(c, 1, 2, 32);
00427 
00428    /* read back naf */
00429    a = (unsigned char) INP(NAF1);
00430    f = a & 0x1f;
00431    a = a >> 5;
00432    n = (unsigned char) INP(NAF2);
00433    a |= (n & 0x1) << 4;
00434    n = n >> 1;
00435 
00436    if (n != 1 || a != 2 || f != 32)
00437       return -1;
00438 
00439    return 0;
00440 }
00441 
00442 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00443 INLINE void camc(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f)
00444 {
00445    OUTP(C, c);
00446    OUTP(NAF1, (a << 5) | f);
00447    OUTP(NAF2, (n << 1) | (a >> 3));
00448    OUTP(CSR1, 1);
00449 }
00450 
00451 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00452 INLINE void camc_q(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, int *q)
00453 {
00454    OUTP(C, c);
00455    OUTP(NAF1, (a << 5) | f);
00456    OUTP(NAF2, (n << 1) | (a >> 3));
00457    OUTP(CSR1, 1);
00458    while (!(INP(CSR1) & 128));
00459    *q = (((INP(CSR1) >> 1) & 1) ^ 1);
00460 }
00461 
00462 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00463 INLINE void camc_sa(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, const int r)
00464 {
00465    int i;
00466 
00467    for (i = 0; i < r; i++)
00468       camc(c, n, a + i, f);
00469 }
00470 
00471 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00472 INLINE void camc_sn(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, const int r)
00473 {
00474    int i;
00475 
00476    for (i = 0; i < r; i++)
00477       camc(c, n + i, a, f);
00478 }

00480 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00481 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00482 static HANDLE _hdio = 0;
00483 #endif
00484 
00485 INLINE int cam_init(void)
00486 {
00487 
00488 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00489    OSVERSIONINFO vi;
00490    DWORD buffer[] = { 6, CAMAC_BASE, CAMAC_BASE + 4 * 0x10, 0 };
00491    DWORD size;
00492 
00493    vi.dwOSVersionInfoSize = sizeof(OSVERSIONINFO);
00494    GetVersionEx(&vi);
00495 
00496    /* use DirectIO driver under NT to gain port access */
00497    if (vi.dwPlatformId == VER_PLATFORM_WIN32_NT) {
00498       _hdio = CreateFile("\\\\.\\directio", GENERIC_READ, FILE_SHARE_READ, NULL,
00499                          OPEN_EXISTING, 0, NULL);
00500       if (_hdio == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00501          return -1;
00502    }
00503 
00504    if (!DeviceIoControl(_hdio, (DWORD) 0x9c406000, &buffer, sizeof(buffer),
00505                         NULL, 0, &size, NULL))
00506       return -1;
00507 #endif                          // _MSC_VER
00508 #ifdef OS_LINUX
00509 
00510    /* 
00511       In order to access the IO ports of the CAMAC interface, one needs
00512       to call the ioperm() function for those ports. This requires root
00513       privileges. For normal operation, this is performed by the "dio"
00514       program, which is a "setuid" program having temporarily root privi-
00515       lege. So the frontend is started with "dio frontend". Since the
00516       frontend cannot be debugged through the dio program, we suplly here
00517       the direct ioperm call which requires the program to be run as root,
00518       making it possible to debug it. The program has then to be compiled
00519       with "gcc -DDO_IOPERM -o frontend frontend.c kcs2926.c ..."
00520     */
00521 
00522 #ifdef DO_IOPERM
00523    ioperm(0x80, 1, 1);
00524    if (ioperm(CAMAC_BASE, 4 * 0x10, 1) < 0)
00525       printf("hyt1331.c: Cannot call ioperm() (no root privileges)\n");
00526 #endif
00527 
00528 #endif
00529    return SUCCESS;
00530 }
00531 
00532 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00533 INLINE void cam_exit(void)
00534 {
00535 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00536    DWORD buffer[] = { 6, CAMAC_BASE, CAMAC_BASE + 4 * 0x10, 0 };
00537    DWORD size;
00538 
00539    if (_hdio <= 0)
00540       return;
00541 
00542    DeviceIoControl(_hdio, (DWORD) 0x9c406000, &buffer, sizeof(buffer),
00543                    NULL, 0, &size, NULL);
00544 #endif
00545 }
00546 
00547 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00548 INLINE void cam_inhibit_set(const int c)
00549 {
00550    OUTP(C, c);
00551    OUTP(DL, 4);
00552    OUTP(DM, 0);
00553    OUTP(DH, 0);
00554    OUTP(NAF2, 60);
00555    OUTP(NAF1, 17);
00556    OUTP(CSR1, 1);
00557 }
00558 
00559 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00560 INLINE void cam_inhibit_clear(const int c)
00561 {
00562    OUTP(DL, 0);
00563    OUTP(DM, 0);
00564    OUTP(DH, 0);
00565    OUTP(NAF2, 60);
00566    OUTP(NAF1, 17);
00567    OUTP(CSR1, 1);
00568 }
00569 
00570 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00571 INLINE void cam_crate_clear(const int c)
00572 {
00573    OUTP(C, c);
00574    OUTP(DL, 2);
00575    OUTP(DM, 0);
00576    OUTP(DH, 0);
00577    OUTP(NAF2, 60);
00578    OUTP(NAF1, 17);
00579    OUTP(CSR1, 1);
00580 }
00581 
00582 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00583 INLINE void cam_crate_zinit(const int c)
00584 {
00585    OUTP(C, c);
00586    OUTP(DL, 1);
00587    OUTP(DM, 0);
00588    OUTP(DH, 0);
00589    OUTP(NAF2, 60);
00590    OUTP(NAF1, 17);
00591    OUTP(CSR1, 1);
00592 }
00593 
00594 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00595 INLINE void cam_lam_enable(const int c, const int n)
00596 {
00597    DWORD mask;
00598 
00599    /* append slot n LAM(bitwise) to LAM mask in controller */
00600    cam24i(c, 30, 13, 1, &mask);
00601    mask |= (1 << (n - 1));
00602    cam24o(c, 30, 13, 17, mask);
00603 }
00604 
00605 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00606 INLINE void cam_lam_disable(const int c, const int n)
00607 {
00608    DWORD mask;
00609    /* disable LAM mask for slot n in controller */
00610    cam24i(c, 30, 13, 1, &mask);
00611    mask &= ~(1 << (n - 1));
00612    cam24o(c, 30, 13, 17, mask);
00613 }
00614 
00615 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00616 INLINE void cam_lam_read(const int c, DWORD * lam)
00617 {
00618    cam24i(c, 30, 12, 1, lam);
00619 }
00620 
00621 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00622 INLINE void cam_lam_clear(const int c, const int n)
00623 {
00624 }
00625
